meanings.sent1: My grandfather used to talk about the pesetas he had in his wallet.
meanings.sent2: In the past, people in Spain used pesetas to buy things.
meanings.sent3: I found a jar full of old pesetas in the attic, maybe we can use them as decorations.
meanings.sent4: The memories of pesetas are like treasures from a bygone era.
meanings.sent5: The sound of pesetas clinking together brings back nostalgic memories.

meanings.definition: A unit of currency in Spain before the adoption of the euro.
meanings.sent1: Before the euro, prices in Spain were often quoted in pesetas.
meanings.sent2: Shops displayed their goods with both euro and pesetas prices.
meanings.sent3: I wish I could time travel back to when pesetas were still in use, just to see how things were.
meanings.sent4: The transition from pesetas to euros marked a significant change in Spain's economy.
meanings.sent5: The value of pesetas compared to euros was always a topic of discussion among the older generation.
